instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01814-A No Power stuck at 20V 0.05A-0.93A
threads.message:
Hello, I have this board with zero history. It worked fine then didn't turn on for some reason.

It is recognized in DFU mode but fails to restore or revive. I get error message:

The System cannot be restored on this device.

The operation couldn't be completed ."AMRestoreErrorDomain error 6 - failed to handle message type StatusMsg (Operation failed))
[AMRestoreErrorDomain - 0x6 (6)]

I used another 2019 MacBook Pro 15" with Catalina and Monterey. It failed both times.


There is no chime, no charging sound, nothing. I connect the charger and get 20v 0.05 to 0.93A in DFU mode.

I took the bottom cover off and board looks fine, no corrosion or damage.

threads.title: 820-01814-A No Power stuck at 20V 0.05A-0.93A
threads.message:
Did you try both revive and restore options in DFU?
SSD voltages are present?

threads.title: 820-01814-A No Power stuck at 20V 0.05A-0.93A
threads.message:
I tried both revive and restore options. Still fails. 

I will take the board out and test the SSD voltages. Is there any specific components  you recommend testing?

threads.title: 820-01814-A No Power stuck at 20V 0.05A-0.93A
threads.message:
Power on sequence for 01598 and 01055 available.
If board is recognized in DFU, but doesn't complete, pay atention to SSD and G3S voltages.
